modName: Hybrid - Werewolf RACE with Lord vampire spell
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]Esse texto esta escrito em duas linguagens, por favor, leia o texto.
[color=#00ff00]This text has two descriptions in different languages, please read text.[/color]

[/size][size=4]Você precisará usar outros mods para ter uma melhor jogabilidade.
[/size][color=#00ff00][size=4]You will need to use other mods to get better gameplay.[/size][/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color][size=6][color=#1e84cc][/color][color=#6d9eeb]>>>[/color][color=#f4f4f4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SKYUI<<<
[/url][/color][/size]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9891][size=5]Werewolf Loot - Opensource634[/size][/url][size=5] 
[/size][size=4]Isto serve para você escolher o GRITO e se transformar em Lorde Vampiro, abra o inventario com a letra "i" e precione "Lalt" para escolher o poder.
[color=#00ff00]This is for you to choose the SHOUT and become the Vampire Lord, open the inventory with the letter "i" and press "LALT"[/color][/size][color=#00ff00][size=4] to choose the power.[/size]
[/color]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#0000ff][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8207]Dimes Quickstart - toaDime[/url][/size][/color]
[size=4][color=#f4f4f4]Isso serve para pular o início e evitar bugs[/color]
[/size][color=#00ff00][size=4]This is to skip the start and avoid bugs[/size]

[/color]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4]O mod permite que você jogue com a raça LOBISOMEM e magia para transformar em Lorde Vampiro, voce pode reverter a forma normalmente.
[color=#00ff00]The mod allows you to play with the race WEREWOLF and magic to become Lord Vampire, you can reverse the form normally.[/color][/size]

[color=#f4f4f4]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/center]
author: Lion464
